entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:34 a.m. NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6Â°C

Observed at: Wreckhouse 5:30 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

Wind: SE 3 km/h

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5 except 9 north of Cape Ray.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5 except 9 north of Cape Ray. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 in the Wreckhouse area. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 17 April 2023
